९०. छापा कगजपत्रहरभन्नाले छापिएको, इन्ग्रेभ गरिएको, लिथो   गरिएको,क / छाप कागजपत्रमिमियोग्राफ   गरिएको सबै फोटो खिचिएकोव प्रकारक समचरपत्रपत्रिका , किताब पर्चा, संगीतको सीट भेट्ने कार्ड ठेगाना कार्ड, छपाईकोप्रुफ, इन्ग्रेभिङ्ग फोटो र फोटो भएका अलबम छपाई सूचनाहरूलाईर रइन्ग्रेभेिङ्ग लिथो, मिमियोग्राफी, फोटोग्राफी चिन्न सकिने अरू कुनै तुरून्तैरवा कार्डबोर्ड यन्त्रिक प्रक्रियाद्वारा सामन्यतया कागजपत्र व यस्तअरूकुनै वस्तुमा बनाइएको लिखत वा उतारिएको प्रतिलिपिहरू सम्झनु पर्छ।ट्रेसिङ्गद्वारा भएको नपाल अचल छपद्वार व व वटाइप तर चलटाइपराईटरद्वारा उतारिएको प्रतिलिपिलाई छापा कागजपत्र मानिने छैनकुने हस्तलिखित टाइप   गरिएको धेरे प्रतिलिपिको गराउने खमूल वप्रक्रियाबाट   निकालिएका यन्त्रिक प्रतिहरू छापा   कागजपत्रकोरूपमतेस्रो संशोधनद्वारा संशोधिततेस्रो संशोधनद्वारा खारेज|

summary: The text discusses the Hulak Savings Bank Regulations published in the Nepal Gazette. It includes amendments made to the regulations over the years, outlining the rules and procedures for operating the bank. The regulations cover the establishment of a Savings Bank Advisory Committee and define various types of accounts that can be opened with the bank. The document also specifies the roles and responsibilities of the committee members and provides guidelines for conducting meetings.

summary: The Hotel Management and Liquor Sales Distribution (Control) Act, 2023 regulates the control of hotel management and liquor sales distribution for the benefit of the general public's ethics, convenience, health, and economic well-being. The Act was approved by the National Panchayat and is known as the Hotel Management and Liquor Sales Distribution (Control) Act, 2023. It aims to ensure proper control and regulation in the hotel and liquor sales distribution sector.

summary: The text discusses the regulations related to the management and distribution of hotel and liquor sales in Nepal. It mentions the authority of the Hotel Management and Liquor Sales Control Officer as per the regulations published in 2024. The text also refers to the amendments made in the laws governing hotel and liquor sales control, highlighting the penalties and the rights of the concerned district officer. The document emphasizes the enforcement of the regulations and the authority to impose penalties for violations.
